item.title: Debugging in PhpStorm with Xdebug locally, in Vagrant or in Docker
item.description: Do you use PhpStorm and have you ever wondered what all those fancy debugging features were? Or could you just not get Xdebug running in Docker or your Vagrant machine? Wonder no more!

item.title: Using Graylog for logging on Amazon ECS
item.description: At work we use AWS ECS (Amazon EC2 Container Service) for orchestrating our docker containers. We have a rather small number of containers running (26~) which all log to CloudWatch. Being unsatisfied by the features such as alerting we started looking for a better logging solution.
